Class NutritionController

java.lang.Object
org.boothverse.foodpants.ui.controllers.NutritionController
public class NutritionController extends Object
A controller which handles user events related to nutritional info

      public NutritionInstance addItem(String foodId, javax.measure.Quantity quantity, Date consumedAt)
      Adds a nutrition item to the system.
      Parameters:
      foodId - the name associated with the food
      quantity - the quantity of the food consumed
      consumedAt - the time at which the food is consumed
